trans-unit.source: Contains information about the changes that occur in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.TextChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller information om ändringar som sker i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.TextChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: A TextChange object specifies where a change occurred in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Ett TextChange objekt anger om en ändring inträffat i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.Offset%2A> property specifies the position of the change, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.AddedLength%2A> property specifies how many symbols were added, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.RemovedLength%2A> property specifies how many symbols were removed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.Offset%2A>egenskapen anger placeringen av en ändring i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.AddedLength%2A>egenskap anger hur många symboler lagts till, och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.RemovedLength%2A>egenskapen anger hur många tecken har tagits bort.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.RemovedLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.AddedLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.Offset%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the change occurs in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, a symbol is a single character.
trans-unit.target: När ändringen inträffar i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, en symbol är ett enskilt tecken.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When a change occurs in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, a symbol is one of the following: - An opening or closing tag for a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> element.
trans-unit.target: När en ändring görs i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, en symbol är något av följande: - en inledande eller avslutande tagg för en <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>element.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> element contained within an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>.
trans-unit.target: -Ett <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>element som ingår i en <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer>eller <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Note that such a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is always counted as exactly one symbol; any additional content or elements contained by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> are not counted as symbols.
trans-unit.target: Observera att detta en <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>räknas alltid som exakt en symbol; eventuella ytterligare innehåll eller element som innehåller den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>räknas inte som symboler.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: - Each 16-bit [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] character inside of a text <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run> element.
trans-unit.target: -Varje 16-bitars [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tecken inuti en text <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run>element.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run>

trans-unit.source: TextChange is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: TextChange introducerades i .NET Framework version 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [versioner och beroenden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of symbols that have been added to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger antalet symboler som har lagts till i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange>introducerades i .NET Framework version 3.5.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [versioner och beroenden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The number of symbols that have been added to the control.
trans-unit.target: Antal symboler som har lagts till i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position at which the change occurred.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger positionen då ändringen utfördes.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange>introducerades i .NET Framework version 3.5.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [versioner och beroenden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The position at which the change occurred.
trans-unit.target: Positionen då ändringen utfördes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of symbols that have been removed from the control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger antalet symboler som har tagits bort från kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange>introducerades i .NET Framework version 3.5.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [versioner och beroenden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The number of symbols that have been removed from the control.
trans-unit.target: Antal symboler som har tagits bort från kontrollen.
